description: Used to update the settings of a channel.

parameters.name: channelName
parameters.description: The name of the channel to be updated.

parameters.name: channelStorage
parameters.description: Where channel data is stored. You can choose one of serviceManagedS3 or customerManagedS3 storage. If not specified, the default is serviceManagedS3. You can't change this storage option after the channel is created. serviceManagedS3 (dict) --- Used to store channel data in an S3 bucket managed by IoT Analytics. You can't change the choice of S3 storage after the data store is created. customerManagedS3 (dict) --- Used to store channel data in an S3 bucket that you manage. If customer managed storage is selected, the retentionPeriod parameter is ignored. The name of the S3 bucket in which channel data is stored. keyPrefix (string) --- (Optional) The prefix used to create the keys of the channel data objects. Each object in an S3 bucket has a key that is its unique identifier in the bucket. Each object in a bucket has exactly one key. The prefix must end with a forward slash (/). The ARN of the role that grants IoT Analytics permission to interact with your Amazon S3 resources.

nested_params.name: serviceManagedS3
nested_params.description: Used to store channel data in an S3 bucket managed by IoT Analytics. You can't change the choice of S3 storage after the data store is created.

nested_params.name: customerManagedS3
nested_params.description: Used to store channel data in an S3 bucket that you manage. If customer managed storage is selected, the retentionPeriod parameter is ignored. You can't change the choice of S3 storage after the data store is created.

nested_params.name: bucket
nested_params.description: The name of the S3 bucket in which channel data is stored.

nested_params.name: keyPrefix
nested_params.description: (Optional) The prefix used to create the keys of the channel data objects. Each object in an S3 bucket has a key that is its unique identifier in the bucket. Each object in a bucket has exactly one key. The prefix must end with a forward slash (/).

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the role that grants IoT Analytics permission to interact with your Amazon S3 resources.

parameters.name: retentionPeriod
parameters.description: How long, in days, message data is kept for the channel. The retention period can't be updated if the channel's Amazon S3 storage is customer-managed. unlimited (boolean) --- If true, message data is kept indefinitely. numberOfDays (integer) --- The number of days that message data is kept. The unlimited parameter must be false.

nested_params.name: unlimited
nested_params.description: If true, message data is kept indefinitely.

nested_params.name: numberOfDays
nested_params.description: The number of days that message data is kept. The unlimited parameter must be false.
